scene_target: Artie reaches the gates of Oakhaven and is flagged as a Statistical Anomaly by the gate scanners.
goal: Establish the world's obsession with stats and the danger of Artie's visible 100% Crit-Rate.
conflict: The gate guards' automated scanners malfunction when trying to process Artie's impossible luck and the aggro-aura of his trophy.
end_condition: Artie is allowed entry into Oakhaven but is assigned a persistent 'Statistical Anomaly' UI tag.

last_scene: Artie fled the Whispering Woods while pursued by a Level 4 Tutorial Wolf and a swarm of aggroed mobs.
He reached the Oakhaven Safe Zone, where the gate scanner malfunctioned while processing his impossible stats.
The System assigned him the 'Statistical Anomaly' title and allowed him entry into the city under protest.

Artie entered Oakhaven officially, ending his time in the tutorial wilderness.
Artie's stamina dropped to 9/100 during the final sprint.
